title: McKenzie Wark, “Molecular Red: Theory for the Anthropocene” (Verso, 2015)
description:
McKenzie Wark’s new book begins and ends with a playful call: “Workings of the world untie! You have a win to world!” Molecular Red: Theory for the Anthropocene (Verso, 2015) creates a conversation between work from two very different Soviet and American contexts. After guiding readers through the work and...
